About ... We provide thoughtful, meaningful design through architecture, interior design, and planning services

what_you_do: Public relations firm providing custom-tailored growth strategies and media attention for clients to gain local, national and international notoriety.
who_you_serve: Individuals, nonprofits, community-based businesses, and organizations looking to take the next step in their public relations needs.
social_proof: Founder Kelly Bennett is a 17-year broadcast journalist, Associated Press award winner for Best Use of Audio, Golden Mike Award winner for Best Live Coverage of a News Story, California Governor and First Lady's Service Award recipient, honored by Orange County Sheriff's Department and National Center for Missing/Exploited Children, member of Public Relations Society of America. Team member Ron Roberson received an EMMY in 1992.
business_focus: Helping individuals, nonprofits, and organizations gain media attention and public relations support through custom-tailored strategies.
service_provided: Public relations, media relations, strategic marketing, social media campaigns, word-of-mouth campaigns, demographic research, graphic design, video production, press releases, copy editing, special event promotion and production
